column2: publisher=Berlin: J.A. Stargardt (Meister Print & Media GmbH, Kassel)

column1: '''''J.A. Stargardt Katalog 698 5. und 6. Juni 2012''''' is an auction catalogue from the German autograph and manuscript dealer J.A. Stargardt.<ref>{{webcite
column7: accessed=1 June 2012}}</ref> The catalogue includes the following Tolkien-related lots:

column1: *lot 275 (p. 154): signed and inscribed ("J.R.R. Tolkien. / To Hans Jörg & Hildegard Modlmayr: with gratitude / and / best wishes. March 15th / 1967") copy of ''[[Tree and Leaf]]'' (Allen & Unwin [[1964]]).
